description:
Payload for a CI gate that concluded with a failure condition.

Covers conclusions: failure, timed_out, cancelled, action_required.
Attached to a generic Event with event_type='GateFailed'.

check_run_url.description: URL of the GitHub check run
check_run_url.title: Check Run Url

conclusion.description: Allowed GitHub check_run conclusions for failed gates.
conclusion.title: Conclusion

delivery_id.description: Webhook delivery ID used as idempotency key
delivery_id.title: Delivery Id

external_provider.description: External CI provider. Currently only 'github' is supported.
external_provider.title: External Provider

gate_type.description: Type of gate. Currently only 'ci' is supported.
gate_type.title: Gate Type

pr_number.description: Pull request number, if the gate is associated with a PR
pr_number.title: Pr Number

title: GateFailedPayload
